title: Provides for the establishment of kinship guardianships for kinship foster parent
summary: Provides for the establishment of kinship guardianships for kinship foster parent; establishes the guardianship after a hearing and determination upon a petition filed by the kinship foster parent; provides that establishment of such guardianship does not affect or impair the natural parents visitation rights.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the family court act, in relation to establishing kinship guardianship
